author: test@example.com
description: Welcome to the new GAE/bloog incarnation of AstroPython.  I've put in some content for each of the categories, particularly in resources.  Hopefully this is getting on the track toward being able to fill in a bunch more and go live.  I discovered that cut-n-paste from web pages preserves formatting and images (!) so it is straightforward to add content from the web.
title: Welcome to the new AstroPython
